awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A new commanding officer arrives at a remote castle serving as an insane asylum for crazy and AWOL U.S. Army soldiers where he attempts to rehabilitate them by allowing them to live out their crazy fantasies while combating his own long-suppressed insanity.

title: The Ninth Configuration
